desc: We offer an amazing culinary experience with Italian specialties. Try our Italian food in a friendly atmosphere. For more variety we also serve American cuisine for you to enjoy. Take a seat outside and soak up a pleasant evening with your family in our relaxed outdoor seating area.

While breakfast options abound, the best choices are high in fiber, protein, healthy fats, vitamins, and minerals. Many nutritious, healthy foods and drinks are also easy to prepare in the morning. These include fruit, whole grain toast, eggs, green tea, coffee, and protein shakes.

Hyderabadi biryani, also known as Hyderabadi dum biryani, is a style of biryani from Hyderabad, India made with basmati rice and meat. Originating in the kitchens of the Nizam of Hyderabad, it combines elements of Hyderabadi and Mughlai cuisines
